mapper.select: SELECT CONSULTING_CASE_ID, MEMBER_ID, CASE_TITLE, CASE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, CCC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID, CASE_TITLE, CASE_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, CCC.CONSULT_CREATE_DATE, LAWYER_ID, LAWYER_NAME, CCC.REPLY_ID, CCC.REPLY_CONTENT, CASE_COUNT, CCC.CREATE_DATE, CCC.REPLY_COUNT FROM ( SELECT CC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID, CC.CASE_TITLE, CC.CASE_CONTENT, CC.MEMBER_ID, CC.CREATE_DATE AS CONSULT_CREATE_DATE, CCR.LAWYER_ID, L.LAWYER_NAME, CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID AS REPLY_ID, CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_CONTENT AS REPLY_CONTENT, CC.CASE_COUNT, CCR.CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY CCR1 WHERE CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = CC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID) AS REPLY_COUNT FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE CC LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_ID, CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID, CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_CONTENT, CCR1.LAWYER_ID, CCR1.CREATE_DATE FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY CCR1 WHERE CCR1.CREATE_DATE = ( SELECT MIN(CREATE_DATE) FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY CCR2 WHERE CCR2.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = CCR1.CONSULTING_CASE_ID ) ) CCR ON CC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_LAWYER L ON CCR.LAWYER_ID = L.LAWYER_ID ORDER BY CC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID DESC -- CONSULTING_CASE_ID를 내림차순으로 정렬 ) CCC )
WHERE R >= #{startRow} AND R <= #{endRow}
SELECT LAWYER_ID, LAWYER_NAME, LAWYER_INTRODUCTION, LAWYER_IMAGE FROM TBL_LAWYER WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
